metadata.description: Build More Efficient, Engaging, and Profitable Document Management System: DMS Enhances your workflow with the Power of Automation, Collaboration, and Security.

Error.title: There was a problem

sideBar.title: DMS System Admin
sideBar.UpgradeDescription: Unlock all features and get unlimited access DMS.

LaunchScreen.welcomeDescription: This launch screen provides a step-by-step guide to help you configure your application during the initial setup.

LaunchScreen.noteDetails: Please ensure you're ready to submit the required information before starting the forms. Your data will only be saved if all required steps are completed; incomplete submissions won't be stored.

SubDomainForm.title: Sub Domain
SubDomainForm.description: The subdomain is the name of your organization. It is used to identify your organization and to create the URL for your organization.
SubDomainForm.domainFormDescription: Enter your desired subdomain for your SaaS application.
SubDomainForm.allowAdminChange: Allow administrators to change the Sub domain.
SubDomainForm.domainError: â›” Please choose a valid subdomain.

organizationForm.title: Create Your Organization
organizationForm.description: This form allows you to create your organization.

organizationNameEn.label: Organization Name (English)
organizationNameEn.description: This is the Organization name that will be displayed on the system.
organizationNameEn.error: â›” Please enter a valid organization name. Organization name must be at least 2 characters long.

description.label: Description
description.description: The Organization Description (e.g., Ministry office, Private company).

contactEmail.label: Contact Email
contactEmail.description: The Organization Email Address. Helps as contact information.

address.label: Address
address.description: The Organization Address / Location of the head office or headquarters.

postalCode.label: Postal Code
postalCode.description: The Organization Postal Address. Helps as contact information.

domain.label: Subdomain
